text: Steve Bernier (born March 31, 1985 in Quebec City, Quebec) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey right winger. He played parts of 12 seasons in the National Hockey League (NHL). He played for the San Jose Sharks, Buffalo Sabres, Vancouver Canucks, Florida Panthers, New Jersey Devils, and New York Islanders.
